# AI Prompts for Coding

> A curated collection of reusable AI coding prompts for code review, debugging, refactoring, testing, documentation, architecture, security, and planning. Optimized for AI agents like opencode and Claude.

## Docs

- [Full Prompt Content (llms-full.txt)](/llms-full.txt): All prompts concatenated in a single file
- [Prompt Catalog API](/api/prompts): JSON catalog of all prompts with metadata

## Review

- [Review Current Changes](/review/review-current-changes): Review uncommitted changes against documentation and best practices.
- [PR Review](/review/pr-review): Comprehensive pull request review with context gathering and prioritized findings.
- [Code Review Checklist](/review/code-review-checklist): Rapid checklist-style review with pass/fail/warning verdicts per category.

## Debug

- [Diagnose Error](/debug/diagnose-error): Systematic error diagnosis to identify root cause and suggest fixes.
- [Trace Bug](/debug/trace-bug): Step-by-step bug tracing through codebase execution flow.
- [Analyze Stack Trace](/debug/analyze-stack-trace): Parse and explain stack traces to identify error origin and fixes.

## Refactor

- [Improve Code Quality](/refactor/improve-code-quality): Analyze and refactor code for better readability, maintainability, and adherence to best practices.
- [Extract Reusable Components](/refactor/extract-reusable): Identify duplicated or similar code patterns and extract them into reusable functions, components, hooks, or utilities.
- [Modernize Codebase](/refactor/modernize-codebase): Identify and update deprecated APIs, old syntax, and outdated patterns to modern alternatives.
- [Cleanup Unused Code](/refactor/cleanup-unused-code): Systematically identify and remove unused code, files, and dependencies from the repository.

## Testing

- [Write Unit Tests](/testing/write-unit-tests): Generate meaningful unit tests that verify actual behavior, not just code structure.
- [Generate Test Cases](/testing/generate-test-cases): Generate edge cases and scenarios that catch real bugs.
- [Improve Test Coverage](/testing/improve-test-coverage): Find gaps in test coverage and add tests that verify real behavior.
- [Review Test Quality](/testing/review-test-quality): Identify meaningless, fake, or ineffective tests that don't actually validate code behavior.

## Documentation

- [Generate README](/documentation/generate-readme): Create or update a comprehensive project README based on actual codebase analysis.
- [Document Function](/documentation/document-function): Generate comprehensive documentation for a function in the appropriate format for its language.
- [Generate API Docs](/documentation/generate-api-docs): Document REST/HTTP API endpoints from codebase analysis.
- [Review Documentation Consistency](/documentation/review-documentation-consistency): Review code documentation independently for internal consistency, accuracy, clarity, and correctness without comparing to implementation.
- [Review Documentation Sync](/documentation/review-documentation-sync): Review code documentation and verify it is synchronized with actual code implementation.

## Architecture

- [Design Review](/architecture/design-review): Review system or component design for architectural quality and alignment with best practices.
- [Suggest Design Patterns](/architecture/suggest-patterns): Recommend applicable design patterns for a given problem or code structure.
- [Evaluate Tradeoffs](/architecture/evaluate-tradeoffs): Compare multiple approaches with structured pros/cons analysis and recommendation.

## Security

- [Security Audit](/security/security-audit): Comprehensive security review identifying vulnerabilities, misconfigurations, and compliance gaps.
- [Check Vulnerabilities](/security/check-vulnerabilities): Quick scan for common security vulnerabilities with actionable fixes.
- [Dependency Audit](/security/dependency-audit): Review project dependencies for security vulnerabilities, outdated packages, and supply chain risks.

## Planning

- [Bootstrap Project Documentation](/planning/bootstrap-project-documentation): Create comprehensive pre-development project documentation through an interactive question-based workflow.
- [Create GitHub Issues](/planning/create-github-issues): Create structured GitHub issues organized as epics with digestible sub-issues that build incrementally on each other.

## TypeScript

- [Type Safety Review](/language-specific/typescript/type-safety-review): Analyze TypeScript code for type safety issues and propose improvements with examples.
- [Fix TypeScript Errors](/language-specific/typescript/fix-type-errors): Diagnose TypeScript compilation errors, explain them clearly, and propose type-safe fixes.
- [Migrate to TypeScript](/language-specific/typescript/migrate-to-typescript): Convert JavaScript files to TypeScript with proper types and an incremental migration plan.

## React & Next.js

- [Component Review](/language-specific/react-nextjs/component-review): Review React component design for structure, props, state management, and best practices.
- [Hooks Best Practices](/language-specific/react-nextjs/hooks-best-practices): Review React hooks usage for correctness, dependency arrays, and common pitfalls.
- [Performance Optimization](/language-specific/react-nextjs/performance-optimization): Fix React performance issues including re-renders, memoization, and bundle optimization.
- [App Router Migration](/language-specific/react-nextjs/nextjs-app-router-migration): Migrate from Pages Router to App Router with server components and new data fetching patterns.
- [Extract Constants](/language-specific/react-nextjs/extract-constants): Identify and extract hardcoded values into well-organized constants for Next.js applications.
- [Extract Utility Functions](/language-specific/react-nextjs/extract-utility-functions): Identify and extract pure utility functions from Next.js codebases to improve reusability and testability.

## Go

- [Go Idioms Review](/language-specific/go/go-idioms-review): Review code for idiomatic Go patterns following Effective Go guidelines.
- [Concurrency Review](/language-specific/go/concurrency-review): Review Go code for concurrency issues, goroutine leaks, race conditions, and proper synchronization.
- [Error Handling Review](/language-specific/go/error-handling-review): Review Go code for proper error handling patterns, validation, and consistency.

## Rust

- [Ownership & Borrowing Review](/language-specific/rust/ownership-review): Review Rust code for ownership patterns, borrowing correctness, and idiomatic memory management.
- [Unsafe Code Audit](/language-specific/rust/unsafe-code-audit): Systematically audit all unsafe blocks for soundness, invariants, and potential undefined behavior.
- [Cargo Best Practices](/language-specific/rust/cargo-best-practices): Review Cargo configuration for structure, dependencies, features, and build optimization.

## Solidity

- [Smart Contract Audit](/language-specific/solidity/smart-contract-audit): Perform a comprehensive security audit of Solidity smart contracts.
- [Gas Optimization](/language-specific/solidity/gas-optimization): Optimize Solidity smart contract gas usage while balancing readability, maintainability, and security.
- [Upgrade Solidity Version](/language-specific/solidity/upgrade-solidity-version): Migrate Solidity smart contracts to a newer compiler version, addressing breaking changes and adopting new features.
- [Foundry Test Coverage](/language-specific/solidity/foundry-test-coverage): Generate comprehensive Foundry tests with unit tests, fuzz tests, and invariant tests that verify actual contract behavior.
- [Hardhat Test Coverage](/language-specific/solidity/hardhat-test-coverage): Generate comprehensive Hardhat tests using Mocha/Chai and ethers.js that verify actual contract behavior.
